sentence.Network_en: His desk is covered with electronic gadgetry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的书桌上摆满了各种电子装置。

sentence.Network_en: In the days before domestic gadgetry and time-saving appliances, food preparation took up most of the day.
sentence.Network_cn: 还没有家用小器具和省时的家用电器的时候，准备食物得花大半天时间。

sentence.Network_en: Then why not just take back all your fancy gadgetry?
sentence.Network_cn: 那你怎么不把这堆玩意给我撤了?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自考英语阅读（一）生词汇总word - 豆丁网 ... grumble 发牢骚 gadgetry 小配件 grocery 杂货.
含笑饮砒霜对《Word... ... top-hatted    adj. 戴大礼帽的 gadgetry       n. 小机件, 小机械 wasp waist    n. 蜂腰, 细腰.
their kitchen is so full of gadgetry that you can hardly move .他们的厨房满了小器具，以致你很难移动。
gadgetry 小巧机械, gadgetry 机械或电子设备, gadgetry 新发明

list.abs: the latest in electronic gadgetry ., 最新的电器发明.
the latest in electronic gadgetry ., 最新的电器发明.
kitchen designers plainly think that the lure of state-of-the-art multi-media gadgetry will pull more men into the kitchen in the future .厨房设计师们显然认为，尖端多媒体产品的诱惑未来将会把更多的男人拉进厨房。

entry.def: Gadgetry is small machines or devices which do something useful.

example.ex: In the days before domestic gadgetry and time-saving appliances, food preparation took up most of the day.
example.tran: 还没有家用小器具和省时的家用电器的时候，准备食物得花大半天时间。

example.ex: ...a passion for the latest electronic gadgetry.
example.tran: 对时新电子小玩意的痴迷
